experience: You and Teri both know Cody McGinley, David Price, and 34 others
You both worked at Charles Schwab
You both worked at Charles Schwab from Nov 2016 to Feb 2017

Responsible for leading the Technology Talent Acquisition organization for Charles Schwab.  Currently managing Talent and Sourcing Advisors to successfully support all  technology hiring needs. Responsibilities include reporting, forecasting, talent acquisition leadership, employee development, and motivating and inspiring others for success.Our goal, as seen through clients' eyes, is that Schwab continuously improves on being a premier financial service provider through best in class service, technology, products, people and advice. If you or someone you know is interested in opportunities with Schwab, where collaboration, inclusion, and innovation are hallmarks of our environment then please visit our LinkedIn company page at http://www.linkedin.com/company/charles-schwab or visit our careers homepage at http://www.aboutschwab.com/careers

Sr. Talent Acquisition Manager supporting the OmniChannel Operations Division at eBay Enterprise, an ecommerce partner of choice for retailers and brands, backed by the full power of eBay Inc. portfolio of Marketplaces and PayPal. Currently managing all Talent Acquisition for 3 Customer Service Centers, 7 Fulfillment Sites across the US and Canada, and VendorNet, a software solutions company. Managing a team of 15 Recruiters and Coordinators nationwide. eBay Enterprise, an eBay Inc. company, supports more than $30B in enterprise enabled merchandise sales volume through our ecommerce technologies and demand generation services. As a leading provider of omnichannel operations and marketing solutions, we support retailers and brands of all sizes throughout the entire customer life cycle to engage, convert, deliver and retain consumers.” eBay Enterprise has a proven track record of helping our clients grow their online businesses faster than the industry, with same-store-sales consistently outperforming ecommerce growth rates.

Staffing Manager supporting Global Technology and Operations Division. Manage a team of up to 15 recruiters to support technical and corporate staffing needs. Experienced with forecasting, capacity planning, and diversity and inclusion. Strengths include building business partner relationships with compensation, HR managers, line of business leaders, and learning partners to successfully manage all staffing needs for Global Workplace and Security, Global Sourcing, Global Enterprise Functions, and COO divisions. Worked closely with international staffing partners to fill overseas roles as well.

Human Resources Manager for small healthcare company. Hired occupational, physical and speech therapists for school systems, hopsitals and clinics in the local DC area. Managed all staffing, government contracts, benefits administration and employee relations issues. Managed a staff of two.

Manage offsite Human Resources office for the litigation division of Aspen. Responsible for recruitment, employee relations, terminations, and general HR issues within the legal division. Recruited and hired legal staff, and support a staff of over 400 employees. Supervised a staff of three, including one recruiter and two administrative staff. Responsible for managing recruitment of all legal personnel to support contracts with the Department of Justice. Recruited paralegals, attorneys, litigation support supervisors, managers, and senior level technical and operational staff. Supervised and approved all benefit's administration, performance appraisals, salary negotiations, and internal transfers. Managed advertising and job fair attendance, as well as the internal applicant tracking system and database. Responsible for supporting the Federal and Commercial Divisions of Aspen Systems Corporation.
Currently attending University College and working on a Masters in Human Resources Management and MBA combined program. I expect to complete the program in the next four years.
Currently attending University College and working on a Masters in Human Resources Management and MBA combined program. I expect to complete the program in the next four years.

Partner with Year Up to create internship opportunities for disadvantaged youth. Help place students into internships with corporations to provide a valuable learning experience and potential long term opportunities for them.

summary: Sr. Talent Acquisition Manager with over 20 years of HR and Staffing experience. Key strengths include managing large staffing teams for mulitiple lines of business, building strong business partner relationships with executive leaders, managing capacity planning and forecasting routines, and working closely with HR partners to fully support the clients needs. Specialties: Strong knowledge base in executive recruiting, industry experience in operations, banking, finance, project managment, engineering, and healthcare. Extremely organized, results driven, and customer focused.
